content:
We have a number of issues around documenting the edition migration changes:

  • Rust 2021 documentation for: Reserving prefix syntax rust-lang/edition-guide#242 (cc @bstrie, maybe you want to tackle this?)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: IntoIterator for arrays rust-lang/edition-guide#238 (who wants to tackle this?)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: Disjoint capture in closures (RFC 2229) rust-lang/edition-guide#241 (cc @WG-rfc-2229 -- we had planned to include the text from your blog post, what happened with that?)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: Or patterns in macro-rules rust-lang/edition-guide#240 (cc @T-lang)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: Default Cargo feature resolver rust-lang/edition-guide#239 (cc @T-cargo)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: prelude changes rust-lang/edition-guide#235 (cc @T-libs, maybe @Dirkjan Ochtman)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: Warnings promoted to errors rust-lang/edition-guide#236 (assigned to @rylev)
  • Rust 2021 documentation for: panic macro consistency rust-lang/edition-guide#237 (assigned to @Mara)
